var.description: Type of build to be created for static analysis purposes. Used primarily by the buildspec builder.
var.name: BUILDSPEC

var.description: 32-bit LLVM/CLANG include path. Used by LLVM builder.
var.name: LLVM32INC

var.description: Root directory for accessing the linker (Windows/Linux) and the assembler (Linux). Used by LLVM builder.
var.name: GNUROOT

var.description: The system's root path (eg 'C:' on Windows or '/' on Unix).
var.name: ROOT_DRIVE

var.description: Custom root directory for alternative LLVM built-in libs. Used by some SConscripts.
var.name: LLVMLIBPROP

var.description: GNU Make bin directory. Used by some tools/builders to wrap make support.
var.name: MAKE_PATH

var.description: PATH var used by system to find executables.
var.name: PATH

var.description: Root directory for CLANG installation (within LLVM). Used by some SConscripts.
var.name: LLVMCLANG

var.description: The location of bin directory for code coverage tool. This is the apps dir for the path of bullseye.
var.name: CCBIN

var.description: Bin directory for LLVM installation. Used by LLVM builder.
var.name: LLVMBIN

var.description: Root directory of the LLVM installation.
var.name: LLVMROOT

var.description: 64-bit LLVM/CLANG include path. Used by LLVM builder.
var.name: LLVMINC

var.description: Name of code coverage tool.
var.name: CCTOOL

var.description: Bin directory for any alternative Perl installation. Should be equivalent to CRMPERL if there is no alternative install. Usable by SConscripts/builders and added to the system path at build time.
var.name: PERLPATH

var.description: Root directory for LLVM built-in libs. Used by SConscripts with built-in dependencies.
var.name: LLVMLIB

var.description: Root dir for the 32-bit MUSL C standard library.
var.name: MUSL32PATH

var.description: Location of the GCC toolchain. Used by LLVM builder on Windows.
var.name: GNUTOOL

var.description: Location of the 32-bit ARM linker. Used by LLVM builder.
var.name: GNUARM7

var.description: Current LLVM version. Used to determine compiler flag compatibility.
var.name: LLVM_VERSION

var.description: Root directory for the system's GNU distribution. Used primarily by cygwin. May be implicitly referenced by other tools on Linux.
var.name: GNUPATH

var.description: Location of the GNU C stdlib. Used primarily by LLVM builder on Windows. May be implicitly referenced by other tools on Linux.
var.name: GNULIBC

var.description: Bin directory for the expected standard Perl installation. Added to the system path at build time.
var.name: CRMPERL

var.description: Directory containing custom executable utilities. Added to the system path at build time.
var.name: UTILROOT

var.description: Root dir for the 64-bit MUSL C standard library.
var.name: MUSLPATH

var.description: ARM compiler root directory. Used internally by the ARM compiler.
var.name: ARMHOME

var.description: Bin directory for LLVM tools (eg elfcopy). Used by LLVM builder.
var.name: LLVMTOOLPATH

var.description: The location of code coverage tool, with the base directory name.
var.name: CCPATH

var.description: Bin directory for the expected standard Python installation. Added to the system path at build time.
var.name: PYTHON_PATH

var.description: Special variable to specify the ARM tools version. Used by ARM builder and some SConscripts.
var.name: ARMTOOLS
